questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A mural painting

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A person
C) A peacock mural
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A car
C) A peacock silhouette
D) A lake

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A cityscape
C) A blue wall
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) Pavement
C) Water
D) Sand

What colors are predominantly used in the mural?
A) Red and yellow
B) Blue and green
C) Black and white
D) Orange and purple

What pattern is depicted in the mural?
A) Stripes
B) Geometric shapes
C) Peacock feathers
D) Abstract art

A) Two
B) Three
C) Four
D) Five

What is the shape of the central figure in the mural?
A) Circular
B) Triangular
C) Silhouette of a peacock
D) Rectangular

A) A historical event
B) An abstract concept
C) A natural element
D) A famous person

A) Flying
B) Sitting

D) Running

What detail is repeated in the mural?
A) Flowers
B) Faces
C) Peacock eyespots
D) Stars

What is the overall theme of the mural?
A) Urban life
B) Wildlife beauty
C) Historical events
D) Technological advancements

B) Eye level
C) Low angle
D) High angle

What is the shape of the peacock's feathers in the mural?
A) Round
B) Square
C) Fan-like
D) Linear

A) Red
B) Blue

D) Green

A) Yellow
B) Blue
C) Red
D) Green

B) Waves
C) Eyespots
D) Dots

B) Color

D) Movement

B) Blue and yellow
C) Black and white
D) Purple and orange

What is the primary subject of the mural?

B) Animals
C) Abstract shapes
D) Landscapes

A) Sculpture
B) Graffiti
C) Mural

What colors dominate the mural in the photo?
A) Red and yellow
B) Blue and green
C) Black and white
D) Orange and purple

A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Glossy
D) Matte

A) Randomly
